answers.answer: Could be Low Blood sugar, when you experience these symptoms eat something , and even suck a sweet candy, if this relieves it you will know, they can do a blood test to determine this you may not be Diabetic,its to do with Eating eat regularly, ton of books out there and lots of stuff on the Internet.

You need to see a doctor asap for a complete checkup. Without knowing your past, or current, medical history, "heads swings and dizziness" can be caused by other medical issues and/or diabetes. Only a medical professional will know for sure. Please don't put off the doctor visit before this turns into something major.

question: I have just recently got my blood pressure check and it was normal but however, for the past 3 days I have been experiencing heads swings and dizziness through out the day and even in the nights.  Tell me what can this be a symptom of ?
title: Could diabetes be a posibility?
